description:
As a guest
  I want to checkout products
  So that I can apply promotion
name: Get discount on Entire Order with purchase over items

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Promotion Index Page
I input "4th Promotion" to search field
1st row of promotion list should contain "4th Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"4th Promotion All Products2020/06/10 01:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Coupon 0 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"4th Promotion"}

steps.name: I should see apply filter label
I should see row of select checkbox list
I click on 1st row of select checkbox list
I select publish of bulk actions dropdown
I should see alert
I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input "7th Product for Checkout" to search field
1st product of products list should contain "7th Product for Checkout"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"7th Product for CheckoutNT$100NT$49","expectText":"7th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st product of products list
I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I fill "2" to product quantity field
I click on add to cart button
I should see cart panel
I click on checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Cart Page
I scroll down to country list dropdown
I select country dropdown option included "Taiwan" of country list dropdown
I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select delivery dropdown option included "7-11 Pickup and pay in store (B2C)" of delivery method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["7-11 Pickup only (C2C)","7-11 Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup only (C2C)","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","(DBW) No integration 711 Pickup","(DBW) Family Mart B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) Ezship pickup and pay in store","(DBW) - LocalDelivery","(DBW) CustomDelivery","(DBW) 7-11 B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) 7-11 C2C - Pickup only","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","Custom Delivery","Family Mart Pickup (no integration)","7-11 Pickup (no integration)","ezship pickup and pay in store","Local Delivery"],"text":"7-11 Pickup and pay in store (B2C)"}

steps.name: I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select payment dropdown option included "Pay on 7-11 Store Pickup (B2C)" of payment method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Pay on 7-11 Store Pickup (B2C)"],"text":"Pay on 7-11 Store Pickup (B2C)"}

steps.name: I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I click on apply coupon code button
I should see coupon code field
I input "711Only" to coupon code field
I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I click on proceed to checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Checkout Page
I click on pick store button
I should be redirected to Seven Pick Store Page
I click on id search button
I switch to main frame frame
I should see store id field
I fill store id to store id field
I click on search button
I click on 1st store list
I switch to default frame
I should see store confirm button
I click on store confirm button
I click on agree button
I click on submit button
I should be redirected to Shop Checkout Page
I fill name to name field
I fill email to email address field
I fill phone to contact number field
I click on same as checkbox
I click on agree terms checkbox
I click on accept marketing checkbox
I click on place order button
I should be redirected to Shop Order Confirm Page
I click on summary collapse
1st row of product unit price should contain "NT$49"
1st row of product quantity should equal to "2"
1st row of product items should contain "7th Product for Checkout"
item subtotal should contain "NT$98"
discount applied should contain "-NT$75"
discount applied should contain "4th Promotion"
delivery fee should contain "NT$10"
total should contain "NT$33"
discount applied should contain "4th Promotion"
---ROLL BACK---
I am on Promotion Index Page
I input "4th Promotion" to search field
I should see apply filter label
I should see 1 row of promotion list
1st row of promotion list should contain "4th Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"4th Promotion All Products2020/06/10 01:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Coupon 1 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"4th Promotion"}

steps.name: I click on 1st row of select checkbox list
I select unpublish of bulk actions dropdown
I should see 1 unpublished item
